component.description: HTML tags for the split box
component.description_zh: 分割框的 html 标签

v-model:size.description: The size of the segment can be 0~1 for a percentage, or a specific number of pixels, such as 300px
v-model:size.description_zh: 分割的大小，可以是 0~1 代表百分比，或具体数值的像素，如 300px

default-size.description: The size of the default split can be 0~1 for percentages, or for specific numeric pixels, such as 300px
default-size.description_zh: 默认分割的大小，可以是 0~1 代表百分比，或具体数值的像素，如 300px

min.description: The minimum threshold, which can be 0~1 for a percentage, or a specific number of pixels, such as 300px
min.description_zh: 最小阈值，可以是 0~1 代表百分比，或具体数值的像素，如 300px

max.description: The maximum threshold, which can be 0~1 for percentages, or for specific numeric pixels, such as 300px
max.description_zh: 最大阈值，可以是 0~1 代表百分比，或具体数值的像素，如 300px

events.name: move-end
events.description: Triggers when the drag is finished
